Access the index of the currently compared feature.

compare

public int compare(FeatureVector a,
                   FeatureVector b)
Compares two feature vectors according to their values at an internal index previously set by this.setFeatureIdx().

Specified by:
compare in interface java.util.Comparator<FeatureVector>
Parameters:
v1 - The first vector.
v2 - The second vector.
Returns:
a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the feature at index I for v1 is less than, equal to, or greater than the feature at index I for v2.
See Also:
FeatureComparator#setFeatureIdx(int)

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
The equals() method asked for by the Comparable interface. Returns true if the compared object is a FeatureComparator with the same internal index, false otherwise.

Specified by:
equals in interface java.util.Comparator<FeatureVector>
Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
